00020 #include <fstream>
00021 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00022 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RRemoteSubscription"
00023 
00024 #include <rdkcore/object/objectmanager.h>
00025 
00026 #include "rremotesubscription.h"
00027 
00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00029 
00030 RDK2_FACTORY(RRemoteSubscription);
00031     
00032 void RRemoteSubscription::read(Reader* r) throw (RDK2::ReadingException)
00033 {
00034     r->startReading(getClassName());
00035         completeUrl = r->readString();
00036         askingHost = r->readString();
00037         socketType = (Network::NetProtocol) r->read_i32();
00038         what = (What) r->read_i32();
00039         when = (When) r->read_i32();
00040         id = r->read_i32();
00041         minPeriod = r->read_f32();
00042         maxPeriod = r->read_f32();
00043         lastIdReceivedByClient = r->read_i32();
00044     r->doneReading();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void RRemoteSubscription::write(Writer* w) const throw (RDK2::WritingException)
00048 {
00049     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00050         w->writeString(completeUrl);
00051         w->writeString(askingHost);
00052         w->write_i32(socketType);
00053         w->write_i32(what);
00054         w->write_i32(when);
00055         w->write_i32(id);
00056         w->write_f32(minPeriod);
00057         w->write_f32(maxPeriod);
00058         w->write_i32(lastIdReceivedByClient);
00059     w->doneWriting();
00060 }
00061 
00062 RDK2::Object* RRemoteSubscription::clone() const
00063 {
00064     RRemoteSubscription* p = new RRemoteSubscription;
00065     p->completeUrl = this->completeUrl;
00066     p->askingHost = this->askingHost;
00067     p->socketType = this->socketType;
00068     p->what = this->what;
00069     p->when = this->when;
00070     p->minPeriod = this->minPeriod;
00071     p->maxPeriod = this->maxPeriod;
00072     p->lastIdReceivedByClient = this->lastIdReceivedByClient;
00073     p->id = this->id;
00074     return p;
00075 }
00076 
00077 string RRemoteSubscription::getStringForVisualization() const {
00078     ostringstream oss;
00079     oss << id << ": '" << completeUrl << "' asked by '" << askingHost << "' (";
00080     oss << Network::netProtocolToString(socketType) << ", ";
00081     switch (what) {
00082         case WHAT_UNKNOWN: oss << "UNKNOWN/ANY"; break;
00083         case STORAGE_VALUE: oss << "STORAGE_VALUE"; break;
00084         case STORAGE_DIFFS: oss << "STORAGE_DIFFS"; break;
00085         case QUEUE: oss << "QUEUE"; break;
00086     }
00087     oss << ", ";
00088     switch (when) {
00089         case WHEN_UNKNOWN: oss << "UNKNOWN/ANY"; break;
00090         case ON_CHANGE: oss << "ON_CHANGE"; break;
00091         case PERIODIC: oss << "PERIODIC"; break;
00092     }
00093     if (minPeriod != 0.) oss << ", min: " << minPeriod << "ms";
00094     if (maxPeriod != 0.) oss << ", max: " << maxPeriod << "ms";
00095     oss << ")";
00096     return oss.str();
00097 }
